articles.description: “We are starting to manufacture this vaccine right now. And we have to have it ready to be used by the time we have the results."
articles.content: Pascal Soriot, chief executive of AstraZeneca, said the company had already started to manufacture the Oxford University Covid-19 vaccine to ensure, if it does pass human trials, it can be made avail… [+1176 chars]
